record.description: Shown at the dress rehearsal of faculty wives' annual original musical show are Lee Cunningham, Paula Woods, and Joan Matlaw. This year's presentation is called, "1776 and all that: Some significant but neglected aspects of the participation of women in the growth of America."
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached caption, UC Mag stamp, see also Spring Issue 1976, p. 35 University of Chicago Magazine.
